key_risks: Significant financial losses due to Rakuten Mobile operations
High debt levels and liquidity concerns
Intense competition in e-commerce and telecommunications

controversies: Substantial debt and negative outlook from credit rating agencies
Concerns over data privacy and security in fintech and mobile services

social_issues: Potential impact on customer trust due to data privacy concerns
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance costs and operational constraints

sources.title: Sensitive Data and the Importance of Protecting Your Privacy
sources.snippet: Steps Towards Protecting Sensitive Data. At Rakuten, we carefully assess how to handle and protect sensitive data. The main guiding rule is not to collect any sensitive data unless absolutely necessary. When we have to collect sensitive data, our approach is guided by a set of privacy standards known as Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs).
